mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reward ( user_id, prize_id, reward_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{prizeId}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.user_name AS userName, p.prize_id AS prizeId, p.prize_name AS prizeName, COUNT(1) AS prizeCount FROM reward r INNER JOIN prize p ON p.prize_id = r.prize_id INNER JOIN weibo_user u ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} AND r.reward_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
